channel.title: Need Help With Delta 317 Source Shops Please
channel.description:
Hey so im having an issue with shops, I go to create a shop i add the WanneShop = 1 and stuff in Client.java, The Npc Spawn in Autospawn.cfg, and The shop information in Shops.cfg. I compile with no errors, i run with no errors but when i go to my server the Npc is there, i click trade it opens up with shop, But theres NO ITEMS =[ Here What i added and where:
In Client.java [code] } else if
(NPCID == 551) { //Shop Keeper
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; //Beggining Shop[/code]
in Shops.cfg
[code]shop = 1 Beggining_Shop 1 1
4722 1000 4718 1000 4716 1000
4720 1000[/code]
in Autospawn.cfg
[code]spawn = 551 3226 3216 0 0
0 0 0 1[/code]
I started with a blank source and client so in shops.cfg theres nothing but this shop ive been trying to add and in autospawn.cfg theres this shop keeper and some training npc's. In Client .java theres about 64-65 other "WanneShop's" Other then this one, Let me know what my issue is if you need more information on my issue please just let me know. -Mage mad nes

item.title: Need Help With Delta 317 Source Shops Please
item.dc:creator: @powerscape powerscape
item.description:
@powerscape wrote:

u need to put this on shops.cfg

shop = 1        Beggining_Shop        1        1        4722         1000        4718         1000        4716         1000  4720         1000

if that not work use this

shop = 1        Beggining_Shop        2        2        4722         1000        4718         1000        4716         1000        4720         1000

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Delta 317 Source Shops Please
item.dc:creator: @Mage_mad_nes Mage mad nes
item.description:
@Mage_mad_nes wrote:

Hey so im having an issue with shops, I go to create a shop i add the WanneShop = 1 and stuff in Client.java, The Npc Spawn in Autospawn.cfg, and The shop information in Shops.cfg. I compile with no errors, i run with no errors but when i go to my server the Npc is there, i click trade it opens up with shop, But theres NO ITEMS =[ Here What i added and where:

In Client.java

[code] } else if

(NPCID == 551) { //Shop Keeper

PutNPCCoords = true;

WanneShop = 1; //Beggining Shop[/code]

in Shops.cfg

[code]shop = 1 Beggining_Shop 1 1

4722 1000 4718 1000 4716 1000

4720 1000[/code]

in Autospawn.cfg

[code]spawn = 551 3226 3216 0 0

0 0 0 1[/code]

I started with a blank source and client so in shops.cfg theres nothing but this shop ive been trying to add and in autospawn.cfg theres this shop keeper and some training npc’s. In Client .java theres about 64-65 other “WanneShop’s” Other then this one, Let me know what my issue is if you need more information on my issue please just let me know. -Mage mad nes
